Summer Outbound Program 2018

Trailblazers Camps are designed to offer your child an unforgettable outdoor experience - away from their regular routine, exploring new skills, developing leadership qualities, taking up new challenges, increasing self belief and independence of thought.

Testimonials


"Oh thank you very much Rashmi !! It was a fun filled day, capturing the memories for life time. Your team did a fabulous job. All of us had a great time. Thank you once again.!!"

- Meena Chitnis, Executive Assistant to CMD, Spectrum Pharmatech Consultants Pvt. Ltd.

“Trailblazers is Flexible, conscientious and experienced enough to develop truly educational field experiences for students.”

- Jim Dehner, Principal - Secondary School Principal, American School of Bombay

“If you want your children to have good teaching and learning experiences, delivered by providers who know their subject, then I have no hesitation in recommending Trailblazers and their team of organizers and instructors.”

- Astrid McKiernan, Principal - DSB International School, Mumbai

About Trailblazers

Trailblazers started out on a journey of discovery, learning and sharing in the summer of 1993. We have traveled, shared, learnt and taught children of all ages. We are The Outdoor School. And Nature is our Guru. Over the years we have designed, planned & conducted extraordinary learning programmes across India & Internationally, for 300 plus premiere institutions from Mumbai and major Indian cities. Schools include Deutsche Schule of Bombay International, Mercedes Benz International School, American School of Bombay, etc. In our quest to give back to the society, we actively partner voluntary organisations such as Pride India, Yusuf Meherally Center - a rural NGO and many more.
